Twisted: The Distorted Mathematics of Greenhouse Denial bụ akwụkwọ afọ 2007 nkè Ian G
Enting, ónyé bụ Prọfesọ Research Fellow na ARC Centre of Excellence for Mathematics and Statistics of Complex Systems (MASCOS) nké dị na Mahadum Melbourne
Akwụkwọ ahụ na-enyocha arụmụka nke ndị na-agọnahụ mgbanwe ihu igwe na ojiji na ngosi nkè ọnụ ọgụgụ
Enting na-ekwu na enwere mgbagha na arụmụka ha dị íchè íchè
Ónyé édémédé ahụ na-egosikwa ngụkọta nke ọnụọgụ ikuku nke a ga-achọ iji mee ka CO2 kwụsie ike
Nke a bụ mmelite nke ngụkọta nke o nyère áká na akụkọ IPCC tupu Kyoto na Radiative Forcing of Climate.
